TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content: Sweet, FS is a good shortcut to make nice landing gear btw, well documented and has much saner defaults than stock stuff.

Cant wait!!! Keep up the outstanding work that we have all come to know BlackHeart!!!

Sweet, FS is a good shortcut to make nice landing gear btw, well documented and has much saner defaults than stock stuff.

Looking at this, it feels like the perfect translation of the shuttles from Star Trek, to a Kerbal style. I could very easily see this played in combination with Extra-Planetary Launchpads to recreate the first Star Trek movie's introduction to the Enterprise.

Plus, if it's good with re-entry, it would probably also function perfectly as the final stage of a ship meant to bring new crew to a LKO space station (and then possibly further in a larger craft). I love it.
